mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND member_role = #{member_role}

SELECT member_no, member_name, member_id, member_profile, member_phone, member_date_create, member_date_update, member_nickname, member_class, member_email, member_role, member_withdraw, member_date_withdraw, member_enabled FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND member_role=#{member_role}
